cv.resume: PhD in Biomechanical Engineering with 10+ years of expertise in orthopedic implantable medical devices, including dental, maxillofacial, spine, hip, and knee implants. Experienced in leading multidisciplinary teams, advancing industrial R&D, and driving innovative solutions to complex technical challenges. Recognized for bridging research and development with practical applications to deliver high-impact medical technologies. Eager to contribute to transformative projects in a dynamic, collaborative environment.
